## Run Analysis

```{r}
source("~/MTGcsv/MTGopt_funcs.R")
draft <- read.csv("~/MTGcsv/m19_draft_180715_comp.csv",
                  stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
num.colors <- 3
num.non.land <- 23
fit.deck <- optimize.draft(draft, num.colors, num.non.land)
```

## Diagnostics

```{r, echo=FALSE}
hist(fit.deck$deck$cmc, main = "Mana Curve", xlab = "cmc")

table(fit.deck$deck$types)
```

## Deck list

```{r, echo=FALSE}
show.deck <- fit.deck$deck[, -c(2, 7:11)]
row.names(show.deck) <- NULL
colnames(show.deck)[c(2, 6, 7)] <- c("colID", "num", "num.used")
show.deck
```

## Worst cards

```{r, echo=FALSE}
head(show.deck[order(show.deck$score),])
```
